If you want to compile the GraphicsMagic in Delphi, you will need to install Graphics32 (version 1.9.1) component for Delphi. 

You could download Graphics32 at: 
http://www.graphics32.org/wiki/ 
https://github.com/graphics32/graphics32

Or check out the Graphics32 SVN repository with TortoiseSVN at: 
svn://svn.code.sf.net/p/graphics32/code
